28#ifndef LOG_INTERNAL_H_INCLUDED_
29#define LOG_INTERNAL_H_INCLUDED_
30
31#include "event2/util.h"
32
33#ifdef __GNUC__
34#define EV_CHECK_FMT(a,b) __attribute__((format(printf, a, b)))
35#define EV_NORETURN __attribute__((noreturn))
36#else
37#define EV_CHECK_FMT(a,b)
38#define EV_NORETURN
39#endif
40
41#define EVENT_ERR_ABORT_ ((int)0xdeaddead)
42
43#define USE_GLOBAL_FOR_DEBUG_LOGGING
44
45#if !defined(EVENT__DISABLE_DEBUG_MODE) || defined(USE_DEBUG)
46#define EVENT_DEBUG_LOGGING_ENABLED
47#endif
48
49#ifdef EVENT_DEBUG_LOGGING_ENABLED
50#ifdef USE_GLOBAL_FOR_DEBUG_LOGGING
51extern ev_uint32_t event_debug_logging_mask_;
52#define event_debug_get_logging_mask_() (event_debug_logging_mask_)
53#else
54ev_uint32_t event_debug_get_logging_mask_(void);
55#endif
56#else
57#define event_debug_get_logging_mask_() (0)
58#endif
59
60void event_err(int eval, const char *fmt, ...) EV_CHECK_FMT(2,3) EV_NORETURN;
61void event_warn(const char *fmt, ...) EV_CHECK_FMT(1,2);
62void event_sock_err(int eval, evutil_socket_t sock, const char *fmt, ...) EV_CHECK_FMT(3,4) EV_NORETURN;
63void event_sock_warn(evutil_socket_t sock, const char *fmt, ...) EV_CHECK_FMT(2,3);
64void event_errx(int eval, const char *fmt, ...) EV_CHECK_FMT(2,3) EV_NORETURN;
65void event_warnx(const char *fmt, ...) EV_CHECK_FMT(1,2);
66void event_msgx(const char *fmt, ...) EV_CHECK_FMT(1,2);
67void event_debugx_(const char *fmt, ...) EV_CHECK_FMT(1,2);
68
69void event_logv_(int severity, const char *errstr, const char *fmt, va_list ap)
70 EV_CHECK_FMT(3,0);
71
72#ifdef EVENT_DEBUG_LOGGING_ENABLED
73#define event_debug(x) do { \
74 if (event_debug_get_logging_mask_()) { \
75 event_debugx_ x; \
76 } \
77 } while (0)
78#else
79#define event_debug(x) do {;} while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
80#endif
81
82#undef EV_CHECK_FMT
83
84#endif
85
